page.title: 13Gray-Nicolls
page.content: {Local History}The world famous Cricket manufacturing company has been based in Robertsbridge for more than 110years. {Trade}The main product from this factory is the famous cricket bat.Stoolball bats are also made.A range of snooker tables has recently been introduced. {Science and Technology}The process of making the equipment has been speeded up in recent years by the introduction of machinery.A bat can be produced in as short a time as 2 hours! {Transport}The finished products are usually sent by Royal Mail but some are sent by British Rail.
